akn:content.akn:p: [§ 2509. Renumbered § 4819] Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 2509, added Pub. L. 101–510, div. A, title VIII, § 825(a), Nov. 5, 1990, 104 Stat. 1604; amended Pub. L. 102–484, div. A, title X, § 1052(34), Oct. 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 2501, required submission of defense industrial base annual reports, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 102–484, § 4202(a). A prior section 2510, added Pub. L. 101–510, div. A, title VIII, § 826(a)(1), Nov. 5, 1990, 104 Stat. 1605, related to defense industrial base for textile and apparel products, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 102–484, § 4202(a).
